body_html:
Hi @ispirmustafa , thank you for your advice.
I have added a test in case gfile.ListDirectory returns subdirectory with delimiter / at 3c44a0c.
Is that OK? Using GCS for temporary export directory is ideal, but I don't know how to handle credentials for that.
body_text:
Hi @ispirmustafa , thank you for your advice.
I have added a test in case gfile.ListDirectory returns subdirectory with delimiter / at 3c44a0c.
Is that OK? Using GCS for temporary export directory is ideal, but I don't know how to handle credentials for that.
body:
Hi @ispirmustafa , thank you for your advice.
I have added a test in case `gfile.ListDirectory` returns subdirectory with delimiter `/` at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/17239/commits/3c44a0c54ad09eed8855d017b18ffbb51b4e68e3.
Is that OK? Using GCS for temporary export directory is ideal, but I don't know how to handle credentials for that.
